keyword: calories in a cracker barrel biscuit
title: Calories in a Cracker Barrel Biscuit
meta_description: Discover calories in a cracker barrel biscuit, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, sodium, and serving tweaks for your meal planning.
h1: Calories in a Cracker Barrel Biscuit
assumptions: Standard buttermilk biscuit from Cracker Barrel restaurant, approximately 60g, baked fresh, no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant preparation, batch, and serving size. Values based on typical published data; check with Cracker Barrel for exact info.

quick_answer.text: A single Cracker Barrel biscuit contains about 160 calories and 3g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a cracker barrel biscuit?
What are the carbs in a Cracker Barrel biscuit?
faqs.a: About 21g total carbs, including 1g fiber and 2g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a Cracker Barrel biscuit high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 380mg sodium per biscuit due to baking powder and salt.

faqs.q: How much fat in one Cracker Barrel biscuit?
Can I get nutrition info for multiple Cracker Barrel biscuits?
faqs.a: Double for two: 320 kcal, 42g carbs, 6g protein, but varies by serving.
